values.value: For information purposes only: please be advised that where the actual start/end dates for the term of the aforementioned service plan (the “Service Plan”) are not provided and/or are listed as “TBD”, the actual date of for the herein quoted Service Plan(s) will be deemed to be either: (i) the day after the Base Hardware Warranty expires; or (ii) where the Service Plan does not immediately follow an expired service plan/Base Hardware Warranty, the day Customer’s order for the Service Plan is accepted by Illumina; and in any event (iii) where the system is not under an existing service plan at the time an order for a new Service Plan is accepted by Illumina, and where Illumina at its sole discretion deems it necessary, the preceding conditions “i” and “ii” are subject to Illumina first conducting an inspection on the system and its ancillary equipment, in order to satisfy itself that the system is eligible for a Service Plan; fees for this may apply and will be quoted for in advance. Illumina reserves the sole right to waive system recertification requirements where any gap in service due to an expired service contract is less than 30 days.
